sentences.en: A young surgeon took the noteworthy operation and became noted ever since.
sentences.cn: 年轻的外科医生做了这个引人注目的手术并从此出名.

sentences.en: Bombing missions were carried out with noteworthy accuracy.
sentences.cn: 执行轰炸均是准确异常.

sentences.en: Book - lovers have some noteworthy advantages over other people.
sentences.cn: 热爱读书的人比起别人来有某些显著的好处.

sentences.en: Especially noteworthy is Accor's entry into the Chinese market.
sentences.cn: 特别引人注目的是雅高进入中国市场.

sentences.en: I found nothing particularly noteworthy to report.
sentences.cn: 我并无特别重要的事情要报告。

sentences.en: It is noteworthy that the programme has been shifted from its original August slot to July.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是该节目已从原来8月份的档期换到了7月份。

sentences.en: It is noteworthy that they found pleasure in many mathematical problems.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是他们对许多数学问题兴趣很浓.

sentences.en: My aunt Ablewhite is a large, silent, fair - complexioned woman , with one noteworthy point in her character.
sentences.cn: 艾伯怀特表姨妈是个身材高大, 生性沉默的人, 为人有个突出的地方.

sentences.en: Science has recently made noteworthy progress especially in this field.
sentences.cn: 特别在这一领域内,科学今天已有了显著的进步.

sentences.en: The bridge is noteworthy for its sheer size.
This noteworthy discovery was made by spectroscopic analysis.
sentences.cn: 这一值得注视的发现是由光谱分析作出的.

sentences.en: This school has made many noteworthy contributions to management.
sentences.cn: 这个学派对管理学作出过许多值得注意的贡献.

sentences.en: Use bold type for headings and bullet points for noteworthy achievements.
sentences.cn: 标题使用粗黑字体，显著的成就要用着重号标示。

sentences.en: What is noteworthy is that the fund - share dividend tide is carried out.
sentences.cn: 值得关注的是,偏股型基金的分红潮也在展开.

sentences.en: What we can accomplish on our own is hardly noteworthy.
sentences.cn: 我们所取得的成就不一定要多么显著.

words.tran_cn: 著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
显而易见的，显著的；值得注意的
显著地，明显地；引人注目地
笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 值得注意的，显著的，重要的
trans.tran_en: important or interesting enough to deserve your attention
